text:
Omise | Bangkok | Software Engineer - Crypto Payments | Onsite

Omise is excited to launch its new crypto exchange and is looking to find the right people to help the exchange grow and succeed. GO.Exchange is looking for an exceptional software engineer focusing on crypto payments to help the company scale and add new tokens on a continuous basis. To do so, this hire will work closely with product, infrastructure, and security teams to integrate tokens safely and reliably.

More info:

https://omise.breezy.hr/p/90876753a84a-go-exchange-software-...

Please apply via website or write arthur at omise.co for more info.
